subStages.name: Establish Measurable Success Criteria
content: Set quantifiable targets for each objective

subStages.name: Ensure Alignment with Organizational Strategy
content: Map project objectives to strategic goals

subStages.name: Set Realistic Timelines
content: Estimate time requirements for each milestone

subStages.name: Create Stakeholder Register
content: Categorize stakeholders (e.g., internal, external, primary, secondary)
Document stakeholder names, roles, and contact information

subStages.name: Assess Stakeholder Influence and Interest
content: Rate each stakeholder's influence and interest
Identify key stakeholders based on assessment

subStages.name: Develop Stakeholder Engagement Strategy
content: Define engagement objectives for each stakeholder
Assign team members responsible for each stakeholder

subStages.name: Plan Communication Methods
content: Identify preferred communication channels for each stakeholder
Develop templates for different types of communications

subStages.name: Define Project Purpose and Justification
content: Outline the consequences of not doing the project
Get sponsor approval on the purpose statement

subStages.name: Identify Key Milestones and Timeline
content: Set target dates for key milestones
Identify any time constraints or deadlines

subStages.name: List Main Risks and Constraints
content: Assess initial risk impact and probability

projectInitiation.stage: Establish Design Team Roles and Responsibilities

subStages.name: Identify Necessary Roles
content: Define core team roles (e.g., UX Designer, UI Designer, Design Lead)
Identify supporting roles (e.g., User Researcher, Content Strategist)

subStages.name: Define Responsibilities for Each Role
content: Outline key responsibilities for each role

subStages.name: Create RACI Matrix
content: List all project activities and deliverables
Assign RACI (Responsible, Accountable, Consulted, Informed) for each item
Review and adjust assignments with team leads
Distribute and explain RACI matrix to team

subStages.name: Establish Reporting Structures
content: Set up communication channels within the team
Create an organizational chart for the project

subStages.name: Plan for Team Training
content: Create a training and development plan
